name: C&C (Chicken & Corn)
description:
Windows Only, 1920*1080  

(This is a prototype with bugs)

Corns consume Chicken manure and produce corns.

Chicken consume corns and produce Chicken manure.

You can sell stuff to the red building on the right and buy stuff from red building on the left.

Try your best to balance the ecosystem in your farm!

(* No BGM, No SFX, No fancy UI, Haven't had time to tune the numbers in game)
